title: Lowell National Historical Park: Deaf / Hearing Loss
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility     Deaf / Hearing Loss              Deaf / Hearing Loss       All Lowell National Historical Park multimedia presentations are closed captioned for the hearing impaired. Printed narrations of the films are also available upon request.  Multimedia Presentations:  Lowell: The Continuing Revolution - Visitor Center The Worker's Remember Series - Boott Cotton Mills Museum Second Floor Wheels of Change - Boott Cotton Mills Museum Second Floor Coming to America Series - Mill Girls and Immigrants Exhibit  Trolley Tour: With advanced notice, park rangers can present the 2:30 Controlling Nature tour using a portable microphone system. Boat Tours: All National Park Service boats are equipped with a microphone and speak system. For specific questions, or to make a reservation, please call 978-970-5000.
